comment.author: 57838910@N00
comment._content: LC has the same image (PPOC catalog number LC-USZ62-26365), attributed to "Carrol's Art Gallery." I recognized it because it also appears in Joan Severa's "Dressed for the Photographer: Ordinary Americans and Fashion, 1840-1900."  The Coovert attribution in this image seems good, based on the caption.

comment.author: 77015680@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/kschlot1] www.loc.gov/pictures/item/2011646606/ Good find. The date for the LC copy is a few days later than the date here, which is taken from the (mostly covered) caption on the frame. The caption may or may not be from J.C. Coovert. The first eight images in this collection are a gift from the Vigo County Historical Society in Terre Haute, Indiana - the Mellor family owned them previously - you can see a family member's signature in the bottom right.
comment.authorname: Mississippi Department of Archives and History
